Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I am Some_Random_Guy and I am a new player to KSP, I am currently on my second mission to the Mun using MechJeb and I would like to ask if you could send me a link to some nice mods for new players. And can someone help me get to Minmus using Mechjeb? Because I once tried it and I got flung into interplanetary space

Welcome! try using a Homman (sorry if I spelled that wrong) transfer in MechJeb to Minmus then use the landing auto-pilot. Check the add-on forum or http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ for mods. Happy Flying!

Try using a Homman

*Hohmann Anyways, welcome to the forums! The Spaceport is the best place to look for mods 'n stuff, but a couple of popular ones are:

- ISA MapSat: Lets you launch mapping satellites so you can find Anomalies scattered around the Kerbol system.

- Chatterer: Adds some pretty awesome ambient noise to the game, in the form of reversed American and Russian mission command transmissions.

- KAS (Kerbal Attachment System): Adds winches, electromagnets and other stuff like that to the game, so you can transfer fuel/resources between ships and craft without docking them, or you can use the winches as 'tethers' so your kerbonauts don't float away from your ships and stations in EVA

- Kethane: I don't use this one, but it adds resource management to the game. You can send probes to other planetary bodies to search for Kethane deposits, and then mine and refine it into biprop, monoprop or xenon, I think!

So there's a couple of mods for ya! Just look around the Spaceport and you'll find some more suited to yourself As for your MechJeb problem, what version are you using?
Hello! Nice to see you! I personally like using Quantum Strut mod and the robotic arms pack.

As for your MechJeb problem, what version are you using?

I didn't really have a problem for a Minmus trip, I used a Scott Manly tutorial and it failed. But I can't figure out how to get on the Mun and have Kethane mining things and not fall out of the sky during the turn or can't even take off! I use Mechjeb for the orbit and Hohmann transfer then I would try to get into orbit and search for Kethane then use landing autopilot and land there but I always have 100 fuel left when I touch down. So I was wanting some help with fuel and weight problems. Hope you can help me
I will try using the Quantum Struts
